faqs.question: How do I apply for leave?
faqs.answer: Navigate to the Leave Management section and click on 'Apply Leave'. Fill in the required details including leave type, dates, and reason. Alternatively, navigate to the 'Leaves' section, select the type of leave, specify dates, and submit your request. Your Line Manager will be notified for approval.

faqs.question: Can I see my holiday list?
faqs.answer: Yes, the Holiday section displays the list of Government holidays.

faqs.question: How can I approve or reject employee leave requests?
faqs.answer: Employee leave requests will appear in the Leave approval section. You can review and act on them there.
